name: Wordle+
description: A Wordle-lover's delight! Extends the classic Wordle game to utilize the entire English language, including words of different lengths. An endless mode enables users to play back-to-back games with target words selected based on their frequency of use in the English language.

name: QuickURL
description: A browser-based URL shortener that allows for up to 68.7 billion shortened URLs with only six characters added to each link!

name: Spectral Cut Optimization
description: A university-level course gave us starting code for a spectral cut algorithm, but when it took between three and eight minutes to run the algorithm on the given dataset, I figured I could improve it. My improved algorithm reduced the runtime by 99.2% on the test dataset and it performs even better for larger input sizes!

name: ID Scanning App
description: This mobile app allows librarians to look up students' schedules from a Firebase database and determine if the student is skipping class with a single scan of their student ID.

name: Smart Assistant
description: A modular Smart Assistant framework designed to make smart home technology more accessible for the average consumer and more customizable for the technical mind.

name: Autonomous Drone
description: A fully autonomous drone built from scratch using an Arduino, simple electronics, and polycarbonate that can fly any pre-programmed path.
